attributes.action: Debar liars from holding public office
attributes.additional_details:
It is routine Criminal record checks are required for numerous occupations - it is only reasonable the public officials be verified as truthful.

Paul Nuttall has made numerous substantiated lies: (https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2017/feb/10/ukip-leader-paul-nuttall-denies-lying-about-being-at-hillsborough-disaster)

In 1988 Boris Johnson was sacked from The Times for lying in an article. https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2016/jun/25/boris-johnson-michael-gove-eu-liars)
attributes.background: Many of those who hold public office or are seeking to do so have been caught out telling lies of a demonstrable and substantive nature in their working or public lives. This has brought politicians and all aspects of government into disrepute and caused immeasurable harm to our democracy.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
